title: Trend Flanders 5/10: Mexican Pizza, iPod, Tom Brady, Crypto, Trump, FIFA
itunes:title: Trend Flanders 5/10: Mexican Pizza, iPod, Tom Brady, Crypto, Trump, FIFA
description:
In this edition of Trend Flanders, Jack and Miles discuss Mexican Pizza: The Musical, the iPod being discontinued, Tom Brady snagging a $375m deal with Fox Sports, Cryptogeddon being upon us, the Trump/Twitter ban possibly ending, and the EA/FIFA partership ending.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
